pkgmetadata.longdescription: Framework for Unified Estimation in Lognormal Models // Lognormal models have broad applications in various research areas such as economics, actuarial science, biology, environmental science and psychology. The estimation problem in lognormal models has been extensively studied. This R package 'fuel' implements thirty-eight the existing and newly proposed estimators. See Zhang, F., and Gou, J. (2020), A unified framework for estimation in lognormal models, Technical report.
